comments.author: angela
comments.body:
with rev. 741213 the following functionality is present

- client
  /jackrabbit/sandbox/spi/spi2davex

- server
  /jackrabbit-jcr-server/src/main/java/org/apache/jackrabbit/server/remoting/davex
  /jackrabbit-webapp/src/main/java/org/apache/jackrabbit/j2ee

- webapp
  mentions the 2 variants of the JCR remoting

comments.author: angela
comments.body:
rev. 743713

extended webapp to contain:

- add overview of the batch read/write functionality
  <jr-webapp>/jackrabbit/webdav-remoting.jsp

- some general introduction explaining the basics
  <jr-webapp>/jackrabbit/remoting/index.jsp

- add examples (links on remoting/index.jsp)

summary: Enhanced JCR remoting (extending webdav SPI impl, basic remoting servlet)
